title: Tuesday Raven (Spy)
description: The read-along CD helps struggling readers and ELL students follow the text word-for-word. Running time is approximately 60-minutes per novel.Pageturners series. Even struggling readers will find it hard to resist our exciting series of novels in a variety of popular genres. The 80-page stories deal with mature themes involving culturally diverse characters. Written specifically for the struggling reader, these fast-paced books maintain student interest until the last page. COMBINATION SETS
author: Janet Lorimer
